# Draft:GLP4 Awards

----
The GLP4 Awards – 2025 Edition is the latest installment of the annual award that honors outstanding personalities and productions in the fields of entertainment, pop culture, internet, fashion, and music in Brazil. Created to celebrate relevant figures within the national cultural scene, the award features wide public participation through open voting on digital platforms.
History
The 2024 edition recorded over 15 million public votes and awarded artists and influencers across multiple categories. Some of the highlights included:
* Camila Loures – Woman of the Year
* Davi Brito – Outstanding Man
* João Guilherme – Actor of the Year
* Larissa Manoela – Actress of the Year
* Bruna Gomes – Digital Star and Entertainment Star
* Manu Bistene – Future Actress
* Gustavo Rocha – Teen Influencer
* Liz Macedo – TikToker of the Year
* Uma Dani – Gamer of the Year
* Israel e Rodolffo – Duo of the Year
* Ana Castela – Singer of the Year
Other notable names mentioned included: Mel Summers, Luan Alencar, Álvaro, Jolie, Vitinho Lima, Alana Cabral, GianLucca Mauad, Gabriel Avellar, Key Alves, Caio e Luan, Fernanda Montenegro, Maiza Tchelly, and Inês Morais.
2025 Edition
The 2025 edition introduces a new visual identity inspired by Amazonian culture, incorporating visual elements evoking ancestry, nature, and digital art. A nomination suggestion campaign on Instagram generated more than 40,000 comments, showcasing strong public engagement and anticipation.
In July 2025, the organization released the official schedule of the awards. The announcement of nominees is scheduled for September, marking the beginning of the public phase of the event. Public voting will take place between October and November, reinforcing public involvement in choosing the winners.
The official ceremony is set to be held in November (exact date to be confirmed), bringing together artists, communicators, and cultural figures from across the country to celebrate Brazilian cultural achievements.
As of now, the final date for the ceremony has not been announced. However, according to specialized outlets, the organization is already mobilizing fan communities on social media, promising a diverse and nationally resonant edition.
